channel.title: [PI] Attacking Problem 317
channel.description: Hey guys, well the problem I'm having is that once you jump into the wildy, and then come back out, it keeps showing the "attack" option on the right click menu, and once u hit that, it takes you straight to the player shop. How can I fix this or remove it in general ? Do you think by removing the whole "View Shop" interface, will make it go away ?

item.title: [PI] Attacking Problem 317
item.dc:creator: @3lv3n_snip3r 3lv3n snip3r
item.description:
@3lv3n_snip3r wrote:

Post your codes for whenever you’re in the wild from your Client class. Search for inWild().

Read full topic
